goal_descEN: Reduce inequality within and among countries
target_descEN: Encourage official development assistance and financial flows, including foreign direct investment, to States where the need is greatest, in particular least developed countries, African countries, small island developing States and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their national plans and programmes
indicator_descEN: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries and type of flow (e.g. official development assistance, foreign direct investment and other flows)
seriesDescription: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries (millions of current United States dollars)
footnotes: Net Disbursements | Based on OECD, DAC database, 2020 | Current USD million
sources: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD).

seriesDescription: Total resource flows for development, by recipient and donor countries (millions of current United States dollars)
footnotes: Net Disbursements | Based on OECD, DAC database, 2020 | Current USD million
